"Xiera":
"<%me>, good work!
Xiera, your exclusive operator, here!"

"A new piece of the Story Board has appeared!
Please make your way to the Bridge!"

"You can reach the Bridge by using the
teleporter on the second floor of the Gate Area.
I'll be awaiting your arrival!"
"Would you like to move to the Bridge?"

"You can progress the story of EPISODE 5 by moving to the Bridge. Please prepare and head for the Bridge.

You can reach the Bridge from the teleporter on the second floor of the Gate Area."
